arts.ttl: Ex-Norwich and Fortuna Düsseldorf winger Christos Tzolis’ wonder goal gives Club Brugge deserved Champions League victory over Sturm Graz
arts.sum: After losing their opening Champions League clash with Borussia Dortmund, Club Brugge could ill afford to drop points against Sturm Graz away from home on Wednesday evening. On paper at…

arts.ttl: Sturm Graz vs Club Brugge predictions: Belgian champs looks more reliable
arts.sum: Sturm Graz and Club Brugge are both aiming to collect their first Champions League points and Enda McElhinney thinks the Belgian visitors are the more appealing prospect in a tough game to call.

arts.ttl: Preview: Sturm Graz vs. Club Brugge - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Wednesday's Champions League clash between Sturm Graz and Club Brugge, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
